title: Will Apple Sell A Smart Wallet For Your Smartphone?
teaser: Rumors are swirling about the unveiling of the newest iPhone this Tuesday. But will it be enough to keep Apple at the top of the pack? NPR's Lynn Neary talks with Farhad Manjoo of the New York Times.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
